name: Atomic Survivors
description:
In a prosperous country of the Soviets, there is an all-out uprising of robots, from which there is no escape. The ubiquitous androids, once serving for the benefit of mankind, suddenly turned on the combat mode and made a real commotion in every corner of the world. The pioneer under your control did not remain aloof from total madness, so the only thing left is to survive, but one day death will certainly put an end to your attempts.

Atomic Survivors is an arena shooter with minimalistic gameplay and elements of a simplified roguelike in which you have to fight against robots. Collect polymer from fallen androids to buy one of several upgrades of your choice. And remember: for best results, choose wisely.

Game Features:
-Simple controls
-Flexible upgrade system
-Replay value
